text: We miss you too. Congrats on an amazing run. Safe travels and stay in touch!
author: sewellchan

text: I’m sorry that our overlap @latimes was brief, but I know your contributions here have been enormous. Good luck at @BostonGlobe. They are so lucky to have you.
author: sewellchan

text: Great news for journalism: ⁦@ruhlmuk⁩ of Minneapolis ⁦@StarTribune⁩ is joining the @latimes graphics and data viz desk. The two newspapers—locally owned—are on the rebound.
author: sewellchan

text: Happy work anniversary! I feel lucky to be your colleague. We are eager to see how you grow — and engage — over the next four years!
author: sewellchan
sewellchan

text: We are elated that @alexaportia of @The_Corres and @gabbfern of @TheAtlantic are joining @latimes as audience engagement editors. They come to us from two news organizations known for digital innovation.
author: sewellchan

text: Our newspaper's owner, @DrPatSoonShiong, wants “to make sure that the Los Angeles Times remains a viable business for at least another 100 years”:
author: sewellchan

text: Last month's project "Surrounded," about the devastating impact of deadly violence on teenagers in Los Angeles schools, is an example of the collaboration this team embodies. Read it here:
author: sewellchan

text: Under the leadership of @palewire our Data Desk has been a model for cross-desk collaboration, digital innovation, an open-source ethos and cutting-edge visual storytelling. We're lucky to be able to invest in this team.
author: sewellchan

text: Thrilled that @sandhya__k of @ProPublicaIL and @rdmurphy of @TexasTribune are joining @LATdatadesk. They are joining the  Los Angeles Times from two of the finest investigative newsrooms in America. They'll each start in May.
author: sewellchan

text: I’d say after you start your first full-time job.
author: sewellchan

text: Alan B. Krueger was always a thoughtful and fair-minded economic analyst when I covered economic policy. RIP.
author: sewellchan
